website_summaries.verdict: The type of dual flush toilet to choose when you do not want to sacrifice on flushing power.
pros: High performance flush option keeps the toilet working without sacrificing any power
Elongated design is comfortable to sit on
Comes with a soft-close lid to prevent noise and damage
cons: The toilet reportedly often comes without the necessary bolts to secure it to the floor

customer_reviews.title: Dang seat and clogage.....
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this toilet. It seemed well made and then... We put it in our back studio that we rent out. The seat kept coming loose and it was clogged three times over the course of three months..... We had enough. We took it out and got a different brand. Now we don't know what do with an almost new toilet that has seat issue and clogs... next years flower pot?
customer_reviews.author: Paul Teske

customer_reviews.title: The 2-choice flush is great! We are country folks with our own well ...
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous profile on this toilet!! It doesn't have those carved out areas that collect debris ... there is JUST the right amount of space between the wall trim and the back of the toilet to get the swiffer in there. The 2-choice flush is great! We are country folks with our own well and septic systems, so water conservation is important to us. The amount of water used with each of the flush choices is just right to remove the contents of the bowl without being wasteful. And it's a very nice looking piece, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Aitchison

customer_reviews.title: Decent toilet terrible seat
customer_reviews.text: The toilet itself is ok not a Toto as far as flushing but almost acceptable. But the seat is just bad. I would never buy another Swiss Madison. They didn't replace the defective seat and they didn't help me find a replacement for their unusually shaped seat. I will probably give this purchase to the recycle center and get a new better-designed toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The toilet works great but 4 starts for installation and lack of bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Scientist

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if the one I got is authentic from Swiss Madison
customer_reviews.text: We got Swiss Madison Well Made Forever SM-1T112 Ivy from Homedepot when we did renovation for one of our bathrooms. We love it. So, when we did renovation for our second bathroom, we decided to get the same toilet. We purchased from Amazon since it would take longer to ship from Homedepot and our contractor was in hurry. The toilet we got from Amazon functions well, looks almost the same as the one we got from Homedepot, except minor difference in appearance, and the quality of the seat cover is not as good as the other ( thinner and looks cheaper). I don't know if I got the authentic toilet from Swiss Madison.
customer_reviews.author: XFL

customer_reviews.title: Sure Not so Much a Tornado?  I Love It Anyway
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these and with my free shipping from Amazon prime, this was the very best price I found. Beat overstock price by $55. They look great and my volunteer installers had no difficulty installing them. They flush just fine, but I 'm from Michigan. I know a tornado and this, sir, is just no tornado even if part two of the flush is included.
customer_reviews.author: RosieWard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not great
customer_reviews.text: The toilet looks very nice in my bathroom. It flushes just fine and does well in most cases. The bowl shape is a little annoying though. The front is too steep so when sitting down I've noticed you get a decent amount of splash to the underside of the seat. Constantly having to clean the seat is a pain. I'm not sure if it's just the finish or what but I developed a hard water ring withing just a couple weeks of installation. The installation requires two people. You absolutely cannot see the bolt holes used to secure it to the floor while lifting it into place. Knowing all this I would have picked a different standard height toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice aesthetics- pain in the butt to install
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet. Nice design. Only issue is the level of difficulty installing this. It’s rather hard to get in place and tightened to the floor since the opening to get your tools and hands in, is not nearly big enough. Also, I have to constantly tighten the seat/lid- which is a project in itself. Otherwise, the flush mechanism and water saver features are great.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Blatt-Potts

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured and described. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the contemporary sleek design of this toilet. The flush buttons work great. The toilet cover is lightweight and closes easily and quietly. Strong flush with minimal noise. So much easier to keep this one-piece design clean. Arrived earlier than shipping estimate. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: C. King

customer_reviews.title: Seat cracked after 1.5 years. Seat size not standard which is a big issue
customer_reviews.text: I bought two such toilets and 20 months after buying those, on the same week, both seats cracked. The seat size is not standard so you can't replace it and the vendor discontinued manufacturing parts.
customer_reviews.author: shani

customer_reviews.title: Love the buttons to flush
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and smooth. Love the buttons to flush. Overall nice tolit.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Hogan

customer_reviews.title: This is the most beautiful Toilet I ever baught in my life
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful Toilet I ever baught in my life; just georgious; next time I need one I will purchase the same again! Great customer service; they replaced a new toilet right away! On a scale 1 to 10, I give you 10! Thank you, Thank you! Monika Luedtke
customer_reviews.author: Monika luedtke

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of the toilet. Hate the seat
customer_reviews.text: Why put such a cheap seat on this? And I cannot find where you can purchase a good replacement seat that isnt cheap plastic. This would get more stars except for the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hudnut

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation
customer_reviews.text: Worse toilets ever to install..if the flange bolts turn your screwed. If you have short stubby fingers your screwed. If the access holes were twice the size would be a little better. If installing one of these charge an extra $100.....
customer_reviews.author: james paul eden

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Great Price loved this toilet had in my house for over 2 months now all working great !
customer_reviews.author: Construction worker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my new bathroom remodel! Love the new modern look! Very well packaged...easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Huber

customer_reviews.title: Great company.
customer_reviews.text: What a fine piece of architecture, my experience has been only positive, great customer service and great product. Real slick.
customer_reviews.author: CGF Brooklyn NY

product_meta.title: Swiss Madison SM-1T112 Ivy One Piece Toilet Dual Flush
product_meta.description: With a contemporary bold design the Ivy® one-piece toilet features a flushing system using two powerful nozzles (instead of rim holes) that create a centrifugal force for a highly efficient flush. This fully skirted toilet has a very sleek look and is extremely easy to clean. • Luxurious Modern Design: The Ivy® offers a Clean, sleek modern and a stylish design. • Dual Tornado Flush: allows you to choose between partial and full (.8/1.28) flush without sacrificing excellent performance • Highest Standard Of Qulaity: Every toilet is Factory water tested • Seat: Soft closing seat closes slowly and quietly. • Warranty: Limited lifetime warranty • Enviorment Friendly: WaterSense® toilets meet strict EPA flushing guidelines, including using at least 20 percent less water than 1.6-gallon toilets. Product Details • Seat Included • Wax Ring Included
feature_bullets: Dual Tornado flush with high-performance gravity 0.8 / 1.28 gallon per flush (gpf).
Fully skirted design for sleek look and easy cleaning
Environment Friendly WaterSense toilets, meet strict EPA flushing guidelines.
Elongated & Comfort height bowl offers added room and comfort.
Soft Seat to close slowly and quietly.

specifications.Included Components: Wax Ring, Hardware kit, Toilet Seat
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars29 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
